segments.text: I stand here observing, and I can't help but feel a sense of nostalgia for my own childhood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Watching the boy stretch toward the cookie jar takes me back to times of innocent mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What I wouldn't give to be that carefree again, even if just for a moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, I also feel a creeping sense of dread as I see the stool rocking back and forth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s expectant gaze fills me with warmth, but also worry—what happens if things go wrong?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman, so focused, uninformed about the potential chaos brewing behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find myself wishing she would just take a moment to glance at them.
segments.speaker: PAR
